name: Stephanie Grisham
summary: Former White House Press Secretary and Chief of Staff to the First Lady who endorsed Kamala Harris and warned Americans are 'terrified' of Trump.

keyStatements.quote: I don't think he is fit for the job. I think that he is erratic. I think that he can be delusional. I think that he is a narcissist and cares about himself first and foremost. And I do not want him to be our president again.
I am terrified of Trump running in 2024.

timeline.significance: Initially worked for First Lady's office
Never held a press briefing during tenure

timeline.event: Became Chief of Staff to First Lady

credibility.background: Former White House Press Secretary, Chief of Staff to First Lady Melania Trump, insider to Trump family operations
positions: Chief of Staff to the First Lady (2020-2021)
Press Secretary to the Vice President (2017-2019)
